name: The Ultimate Drift Defender
description:
The newest installment of the Ursal franchise.

In the year of 2129 the earth has been completely devastated.  Right now, Ursal has control of the last garage of the world. But his enemies can`t stand that, they are comming for him, and they are not few. Will Ursal be able to protect the last garage in the world? It`s up to you to decide.

Controls:

WASD, Spacebar - Move
Left Click - Boost
Right Click - DROP MINE
ALT + F4 - QUIT

Your antivirus may flag it as a virus. But I promise it's not. It happens because the .exe is not signed. All you need to do is to allow it throug the antivirus. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Once again we started late a game jam. This game was made for the Mix and Game Jam 2020, and was made in 24h give or take.

ART - @LuisBentoArt

PROGRAMMING - @tryus97
